title: The S
clause_text: The S.R.S. already sanctioned under the earlier provisions can be allowed to be developed under the said Regulations in case the full occupation certificate has not been issued and compliance in respect of payment against Operation and Maintenance Corpus and Infrastructure Development Charges (I.D.C.) has been done; provided that the C.E.O., S.R.A. shall have the powers to give approval to changes in building height and internal
